gw.api.database

Interface QueryOptimizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlterOptimizerDynamicSampling, DisableBtreeToBitmapConversion, DisableHashJoin, DisableIndexFastFullScan, DisableIndexJoin, DisableIndexSkipScan, DisableOptimizerCostbasedTransformation, DisableOracleISSFix8893626, DisableSortMergeJoin, EnableOracleQueryRewrite, EncourageSequentialScanQueryOptimizer, GenericPlannerQueryOptimizer, OracleQueryRewriteIntegrity, SetSemiJoinNestedLoops, SwitchOracleConsumerGroup

    public interface QueryOptimizer
    Allows a DB optimization to be performed on the query before it is sent.

    There are two methods that can be used for optimization, before query and after query. These methods can access the DB to turn on options.

    Author:
    dbrewster

    • Method Detail

      • shouldExecute

        @Deprecated
boolean shouldExecute()
        Deprecated. This method will be removed in a future release. Do not use.
        Hook for each implementation to have a chance to decide whether to execute. Typically, each QueryOptimizer would check whether it is applicable for the current database.
        Returns:
        true if this optimizer should execute
